ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Approving the Interim Order Respect¬Å]ing Releases of Benzene from Petrochemical Facilities in Sarnia, Ontario
PrecisOrder Approving the INTERIM ORDER RESPECTING RELEASES OF BENZENE FROM PETROCHEMICAL FACILITIES IN SARNIA, ONTARIO, made by the Minister of the Environment on May 16, 2024, in order to extend its application for up to two years.
